kickstart.post:
for i in gpm kudzu keytable cups apmd linuxconf identd pcmcia rhnsd xfs \ lpd restorecond mcstrans bluetooth hidd yum-updatesd avahi-daemon \ pcscd ; do if [ -f /etc/rc.d/init.d/$i ]; then /sbin/chkconfig $i off fi done
gawk '/net\.ipv4\.ip_forward/ { \ printf("net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1\n"); \ next; \ } \ { print $0 }' /etc/sysctl.conf > /tmp/sysctl.conf mv /tmp/sysctl.conf /etc/sysctl.conf
MANPATH /opt/rocks/man
if [ -d /opt/x86-libs ] then (cd /opt/x86-libs; \ find | cpio -pdu /) /sbin/ldconfig fi
